name: Using Search
description: Find exactly what you need in seconds with search, favorites, and keyboard shortcuts.

steps.title: Search Button
steps.task: Your fastest path to anything. Open search and start typing to find components, composables, and guides.
steps.hint: Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac)

steps.title: Search Input
steps.task: Type and watch. Results appear instantly as you type—no waiting, no Enter key needed.
steps.hint: Arrow keys navigate results, Enter selects.
steps.learn: Get instant results as you type

steps.title: Search Results
steps.task: Organized by type. Components, composables, guides—scroll or arrow through to find what you need.

steps.title: Favorite Results
steps.task: Bookmark your go-tos. Star anything you use often and it'll be waiting at the top next time.

steps.title: Ask AI
steps.task: Skip the reading. Hit this to jump straight to a page and ask AI to explain it.
steps.learn: Get AI explanations for any topic

steps.title: Dismiss Results
steps.task: Too many results? Dismiss irrelevant matches and focus on what matters.
steps.learn: Filter out noise from search results

steps.title: Search History
steps.task: Pick up where you left off. Recent searches stick around between sessions.

steps.title: Favorited!
steps.task: We just added Tabs to your favorites. Notice it now appears at the top for quick access anytime you open search.

steps.title: That's Search
steps.task: Hit Ctrl+K whenever you need something—it's the fastest way around the docs.
